name: fudr
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebookincubator/create-react-app).

scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" "cd client && rm -rf node_modules build package-lock.json" "cd server && rm -rf node_modules build package-lock.json"
scripts.install: (cd server && npm install) && (cd client && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"

author: Jeff
